name: Beatmania
synopsis: Now you can spin more than 50 club tracks in the DJ simulation Beatmania. Beatmania comes with a special DJ controller, which uses buttons and a rotating pad to simulate a turntable. The game features hits from some of the hottest DJs in genres such as techno, drum-'n-bass, and house. You can play through the songs by matching the beat being displayed on the screen with your controller. Beatmania also includes both cooperative and competitive two-player play.
